original_question: Sepals, petals, pistils, and stamens are contained in all what, which are actually modified leaves or sporophylls organized around a central stalk?
diverse_qns: Which parts of a plant, specifically called modified leaves or sporophylls, are arranged around a central stalk and consist of sepals, petals, pistils, and stamens?
What is the term for modified leaves or sporophylls that are organized around a central stalk and include sepals, petals, pistils, and stamens?
Sepals, petals, pistils, and stamens are all parts of what structure which is built around a central stalk and is actually formed from modified leaves or sporophylls?
What structures, made of modified leaves or sporophylls and organized around a central stalk, do sepals, petals, pistils, and stamens belong to?
What, in botanical terms, do we call a structure which is built around a central stalk, consists of modified leaves or sporophylls, and includes sepals, petals, pistils, and stamens?
In biology, what term refers to the modified leaves or sporophylls that are grouped around a central stalk to form sepals, petals, pistils, and stamens?
Which element of a plant, structured around a central stalk, is made up of modified leaves or sporophylls and encompasses sepals, petals, pistils, and stamens?
Sepals, petals, pistils, and stamens are all part of what entity that comprises modified leaves or sporophylls and is organized around a central stalk?
What feature, made from modified leaves or sporophylls and located around a central stalk, contains parts like sepals, petals, pistils, and stamens?
What are sepals, petals, pistils, and stamens all parts of, which are actually modified leaves or sporophylls that are centered around a stalk?
pred_diverse_ans: Flowers are the modified leaves or sporophylls of a plant that are arranged around a central stalk and consist of sepals, petals, pistils, and stamens.
The term for modified leaves or sporophylls that are organized around a central stalk and include sepals, petals, pistils, and stamens is "flower."
The element of a plant structured around a central stalk is called a flower.
